00052 // struct for vehicles
00053 typedef struct
00054 {
00055  PathStPtr pMercPath;  // vehicle's stategic path list
00056  UINT8     ubMovementGroup; // the movement group this vehicle belongs to
00057  UINT8     ubVehicleType; // type of vehicle 
00058  INT16     sSectorX;   // X position on the Stategic Map
00059  INT16     sSectorY;   // Y position on the Stategic Map
00060  INT16     sSectorZ;
00061  BOOLEAN fBetweenSectors;  // between sectors?
00062  INT16             sGridNo;   // location in tactical
00063  SOLDIERTYPE *pPassengers[ 10 ];
00064  UINT8             ubDriver;
00065  INT16             sInternalHitLocations[ NUMBER_OF_EXTERNAL_HIT_LOCATIONS_ON_VEHICLE ];
00066  INT16             sArmourType;
00067  INT16             sExternalArmorLocationsStatus[ NUMBER_OF_EXTERNAL_HIT_LOCATIONS_ON_VEHICLE ];
00068  INT16             sCriticalHits[ NUMBER_OF_INTERNAL_HIT_LOCATIONS_IN_VEHICLE ];
00069  INT32             iOnSound;
00070  INT32             iOffSound;
00071  INT32             iMoveSound;
00072  INT32             iOutOfSound;
